amendment.description: Amendment adds language consisting of the "DC Parental Choice Incentive Act of 2003".
amendment.purpose: An amendment to authorize a school voucher program in the District of Columbia. Students will be eligible for up to $7500 in funds to attend a private elementary or high school in the District. Eligible students must be residents of the District and their family income could not exceed 185% of the federal poverty level.
